amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes relating to policy and procedure-setting with respect to irrigation districts or water users associations and clarifies that nothing in the bill affects existing arrangements between irrigation and water districts and the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical changes relating to policy and procedure-setting with respect to irrigation districts or water users associations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
